jobDescription: At World Fuel Services, our employees are the key to our global success.We are industry leaders due to the innumerable talents of our approximately 5000- strong professional team. World Fuel Services is looking for a senior data analyst to synthesize and leverage our aviation and transactional datasets to drive improved business performance and enable data-driven technology products. This is an outstanding opportunity to join a passionate leadership team who is committed to making data-driven decisions in a rapidly changing market. A successful candidate in this role will play an instrumental part in our pursuit of developing and maturing our team's use of data analytics, modeling and visualization to move from basic metrics reviews to applied business intelligence and data-driven action. If you have been dreaming of doing analytics and turning your insights into action, this could be your next job.
